channel.title: Standards on SBOM Insights
channel.description: Recent content in Standards on SBOM Insights

item.title: Sbomqs Scoring Support for Bsi 1.1 and Bsi 2.0 in a Summarized Way
item.description:
Hey SBOM community,

Love to see you back here learning something new. If youâ€™re working with SBOMs, you probably know that generating SBOM is just a first step. What you get after generating SBOM is just a raw SBOM ? And the raw SBOM is incomplete, inaccurate sometime and most importantly not even comply with NTIA minimum element according to this research whitepaper.

And that’s exactly where your involvement comes to enrich the SBOM, augument the SBOM, etc to make a better quality SBOM with completeness, accuracy and enriched data. At the end the real power of SBOM lies within itself i.e data. Because at the end these SBOM will be feeded to SBOM platform which perform complete analysis of the SBOM. The more complete and correct the data is, the more it helps you understand and reduce risk in your software supply chain.
